# thetalake_analysis_policies (Data Source)

Theta Lake Analysis Policies Data Source. Retrieves a list of analysis policies.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "thetalake_analysis_policies" "example" {}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `policies` (List of Object) List of analysis policies (see below for nested schema)

<a id="nestedatt--policies"></a>
### Nested Schema for `policies`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp
- `description` (String) Policy description
- `id` (Number) Policy ID
- `is_built_in` (Boolean) Whether the policy is built-in
- `name` (String) Policy name
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp
